Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.helpers

Klasse ValidationHelperFX

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.helpers.ValidationHelperFX
public class ValidationHelperFX extends Object
Utility class for validating user input fields in JavaFX. Ensures that required fields are filled and values meet specified criteria.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ValidationHelperFX

      public ValidationHelperFX()

  • Methodendetails

    • validateMandatoryFieldsFX

      public boolean validateMandatoryFieldsFX(javafx.scene.control.Control... controls)
      Validates that the given controls are not empty. Highlights invalid fields with an error style class.
      Parameter:
      controls - an array of JavaFX controls to validate
      Gibt zurück:
      true if all controls are valid, false otherwise

    • isValidAmount

      public boolean isValidAmount(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Validates if the given input is a valid monetary amount (numeric and non-zero). Applies error styling if the input is invalid.
      Parameter:
      textField - the TextField input to validate
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the input is a valid amount, false otherwise

    • validateTextField

      private boolean validateTextField(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Checks if a TextField is not empty and applies error styling if necessary.
      Parameter:
      textField - the TextField to validate
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the field is not empty, false otherwise

    • validateDatePicker

      private boolean validateDatePicker(javafx.scene.control.DatePicker datePicker)
      Checks if a DatePicker has a selected date and applies error styling if necessary.
      Parameter:
      datePicker - the DatePicker to validate
      Gibt zurück:
      true if a date is selected, false otherwise

    • validateComboBox

      private boolean validateComboBox(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<?> comboBox)
      Checks if a ComboBox has a selected value and applies error styling if necessary.
      Parameter:
      comboBox - the ComboBox to validate
      Gibt zurück:
      true if a value is selected, false otherwise

    • updateControlStyle

      private void updateControlStyle(javafx.scene.control.Control control, boolean isValid)
      Updates the style class of a control based on its validation state. Ensures that valid controls do not have error styling while invalid ones are marked.
      Parameter:
      control - the Control to update
      isValid - true if the control is valid, false if invalid
